newsArray.title: MCC Announces New Edition of Laws for Cricket; Multiple Changes to Be Enforced From October 2026
newsArray.description: The MCC’s 2026 law changes mark the first major update since 2022, with 73 revisions including laminated bats’ legalization, new ball standards, clarified rules on short runs, catches, overthrows, and umpire discretion.
creator: editor@republicworld.com (pavitra shome)

newsArray.title: We want Ishan to be a game-changer: Suryakumar Yadav
newsArray.description: Suryakumar Yadav Hails Ishan Kishan’s Impact After Maiden T20I Century Ishan Kishan Scores First T20I Hundred Against New Zealand India’s wicketkeeper-batter Ishan Kishan scored his maiden T20 International century in the third match of the five-game series against New Zealand on Saturday, 31 January 2026. newsArray.title: Last over in multi-day cricket to continue despite a wicket after latest amendments to Laws
newsArray.description: The final over of the day’s play in multi-day cricket, including potentially in Tests, will not end if there is a wicket. As per the new edition of the Laws of Cricket, which were announced by the MCC on Tuesday, the over will be completed, and a new batter will need to walk in. That [...]

newsArray.title: Nepal Sneaks into 2031 World Cup Chatter as Co-Hosts with India, Stealing a March on Bangladesh Amid T20 WC Chaos
newsArray.description: The upcoming T20 World Cup, set for February 2026 in India and Sri Lanka, has ignited controversy involving Pakistan and Bangladesh's disputes with the ICC. Social media users have humorously speculated about hosting shifts for the 2031 World Cup amid rising tensions.
creator: tn sports desk

newsArray.title: From 2007 to 2026: Brendan Taylor Set To Make World Cup History
newsArray.description: Zimbabwe's Brendan Taylor is set to create history in the upcoming 2026 T20 World Cup. He will become the first cricketer to feature in the 2007 T20 WC and the upcoming ICC event. Taylor had once retired from international cricket and he didn't play for Zimbabwe for more than two years. Taylor is now on the cusp of creating a world record.
creator: rishav narang
